# eui-chip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                         | Type                             | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `label`   | `label`   | sets the label of the chip          | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `rounded` | `rounded` | if true the will have rounded edges | `boolean`                        | `undefined` |
| `size`    | `size`    | sets the size of the component      | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'small'`   |
